---
id: retrieve-reward-claim-history
title: "Retrieve Reward Claim History"
description: "Returns a list of reward claim history by core address within a given round range. Limited to 100 rounds on each query."

import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve Reward Claim History"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/rewards/claim_history"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of reward claim history by core address within a given round range. Limited to 100 rounds on each query.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"coreAddress","in":"query","required":true,"description":"The core address to retrieve the reward claim history for.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"startRound","in":"query","required":true,"description":"The starting round of the range for which the reward claim history is requested.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"endRound","in":"query","required":true,"description":"The ending round of the range for which the reward claim history is requested.","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Reward claim history retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Status code of the response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message providing additional details about the response."},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"array","description":"List of reward claim records.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"stakedHashReward":{"type":"string","description":"Amount of HASH rewards staked in the given round."},"round":{"type":"integer","description":"The round number associated with the reward claim."},"gradeList":{"type":"array","description":"List of grades showing reward rates and percentages.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"rewardRate":{"type":"integer","description":"The reward rate for the grade."},"percentage":{"type":"integer","description":"The percentage of the total reward for the grade."}}}},"stakedCoreReward":{"type":"string","description":"The CORE rewards staked in the given round."},"myStakeRate":{"type":"object","description":"User's staking rate details.","properties":{"stakeRatio":{"type":"string","description":"The ratio of the user's stake to the total stake."},"percent":{"type":"string","description":"The percentage of the user's stake in relation to the total stake."}}},"totalRewardClaimed":{"type":"string","description":"The total rewards claimed in the given round."},"stakedBTCReward":{"type":"string","description":"The BTC rewards staked in the given round."}}}}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid input parameters or core address.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code of the response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message explaining the issue."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
